ModMetaData.name: Ouranos Commissioned World
ModMetaData.author: Danzen
ModMetaData.description:
Please note that this map depends on WorldEdit 2.0, and Harmony to function!
Select the mod in your mods list, click 'new colony' until you get to select world template. Here you should see the "Ouranos Commissioned World" map selectable. You just go on from there.
